title: Restaurant Website with Menu, About, and Contact Pages

requirements.summary: Create home page with welcome message, tagline, description, service highlights, and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays the welcome heading with emoji
Service highlights are displayed with checkmark emojis

file_operations.description: Create home page component displaying 'Welcome to Our Restaurant üçΩÔ∏è' as main heading, tagline 'We serve fresh, tasty, and affordable food every day', description about being perfect for family and friends using fresh ingredients, service highlights (dine in/take away, friendly service, clean environment) with checkmark emojis, the generated hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png, and call-to-action 'Visit us today and enjoy delicious food!'

requirements.summary: Create menu page with three sections displaying menu items and prices, with admin edit capability
acceptanceCriteria: Menu displays three distinct sections with category emojis
All menu items display name and price
Admin can edit prices for any menu item
Price changes persist after page reload

file_operations.description: Create menu page component that fetches menu items from backend using getMenuItems(), displays three sections: Main Dishes (with frontend/public/assets/generated/main-dishes-icon.dim_128x128.png showing Chicken Biryani $5, Beef Curry $6, Fried Rice $4, Chicken Burger $4), Fast Food (with frontend/public/assets/generated/fast-food-icon.dim_128x128.png showing Pizza $7, French Fries $2, Sandwich $3), and Drinks (with frontend/public/assets/generated/drinks-icon.dim_128x128.png showing Cold Drinks $1, Fresh Juice $2, Water $0.5). Include admin edit mode toggle that allows updating prices via updateMenuItem backend method

Create menu item card component that displays item name, price, and edit button (when in admin mode). Include inline price editing capability that calls updateMenuItem backend method when price is changed

requirements.summary: Create About Us page describing the restaurant, goals, and values
acceptanceCriteria: About page displays the restaurant description
Three main goals are listed clearly

file_operations.description: Create About Us page component displaying 'We are a local restaurant serving our community with love and care', three goals (provide fresh and quality food, good taste at fair price, friendly customer service), closing messages 'We believe good food brings people together' and 'Thank you for choosing our restaurant'

requirements.summary: Create contact page displaying address, phone, hours, and email with admin edit capability
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays all four contact information fields with appropriate icons
Admin can edit address, phone, hours, and email
Updated contact information persists after page reload

file_operations.description: Create contact page component that fetches contact info from backend using getContactInfo(), displays address ('Your Street Name, Your Area, Your City'), phone ('+880 1XXXXXXXXX'), hours ('Everyday: 10:00 AM ‚Äì 10:00 PM'), and email ('yourrestaurant@email.com') with appropriate icons. Include admin edit mode toggle that allows updating all fields via updateContactInfo backend method

requirements.summary: Implement navigation between Home, Menu, About Us, and Contact pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is visible on all pages
Users can navigate between all four pages
Active page is visually indicated in navigation

file_operations.description: Create navigation component with links to Home, Menu, About Us, and Contact pages. Include visual indication of active page
Set up routing for Home (/), Menu (/menu), About Us (/about), and Contact (/contact) pages. Include Navigation component in the layout so it appears on all pages

requirements.summary: Design warm, inviting visual theme with earth tones and family-friendly atmosphere
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, welcoming tones throughout
Typography is clear and readable for menu items and content
Layout creates an inviting, family-friendly atmosphere

file_operations.description: Update global styles to use warm earth tone color palette (amber, terracotta, cream). Set base typography with readable font families and sizes suitable for menu items and content
Extend Tailwind theme with custom warm earth tone colors (amber primary, terracotta accent, cream background) and configure typography for family-friendly readability
Create layout component wrapper that applies warm, inviting visual theme with earth tones, includes Navigation component, and provides consistent spacing and structure for all pages
